label: LocationParty
comment: An individual, a group, or a body having a role related to a location.

datatypeProperties.comment: A unique country identifier for this location party.
A code specifying a role of this location party.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.

objectProperties.comment: A trade contact defined for this location party.
Facsimile communication information for this contact person.
A postal address for this legally set up organization.
A transport service provided by this location party.
A transport related person specified for this location party.
A telephone communication for this trade party.
A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) communication for this trade party, such as a web or email address.

referencedBy.comment: A servicing party specified for this logistics related location.
